title: Top Floor 2 Bedroom 2 Bath Penthouse w/ Lots of Light. Westwood!
neighborhood: Westwood 90024/UCLA, Brentwood, West LA, Beverly Hills
posting_body: Top floor 2 bedroom 2 bath penthouse apartment w/ 2 balconies and lots of light.
Top floor 2 bedroom 2 bath penthouse apartment in Westwood with 2 balconies and clear view, lots of sunlight, laminate wood flooring, and carpeted bedroom!
Apartment features include central air, a gas fireplace, full kitchen with quartz countertops and equipped with a dishwasher, a microwave, a refrigerator and a gas stove.
Gated access community with a soothing spa, fitness center, disability access, a picnic area with barbecue, and onsite maintenance.
Midvale Towers is a chic apartment community located in Westwood, Los Angeles.
We offer contemporary Studio, 1 and 2 bedroom floor plans designed with your needs in mind.
Nestled South of Wilshire Blvd., you are in close proximity to UCLA, UCLA Medical Center, and Century City.
Treat yourself to everyday conveniences immediately outside your front door like Bristol Farms, Sprouts Farmers Market, Ralphs, Target, Trader Joe’s and 99 Ranch Market.
Underground parking included and extra storage available!
Book an in-person or virtual tour today with one of our friendly and knowledgeable leasing associates at
